Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Prepare for the playtest by ensuring all refined mechanics and secondary systems are integrated.
Meet with @qtest-1 and @ldes-1 to discuss the playtest plan and objectives.
Conduct the playtest with a small group of testers. Observe and take notes on player interactions and feedback.
Analyze the playtest data and feedback. Identify any balancing issues or bugs that need immediate attention.
Document the findings and prepare a report for the team. Send an update email to @prod-1 and @ldes-1.
